column1: Services for Wayne will be held on Friday
column3: 2015 at 1 pm at Our Lady of LaSalette Catholic Church with Father Ernie Corriveau
column4: M.S. officiating. Burial will follow at Mimosa Pines North. The family will receive friends on Thursday
column6: 2015 at Johnson and Robison Funeral Home from 5-9 pm with a rosary at 6 pm and will resume on Friday from 9 am until the time of service.
